users.description: Amante de Magic: The Gathering, siempre en busca de nuevos mazos y estrategias. Mi color favorito de maná es [Inserta tu color aquí] y disfruto jugando con [tu tipo de mazo o comandante favorito]. ¡Vamos a jugar y compartir ideas sobre este increíble juego!

decks.creator: admin
decks.name: Green - Commander Rats
decks.description: Deck enfocado a todas las ratitas que se creen que por saber mucho me van a ganar con sus mazos de mierda. Staquear ratitas es los pricipal.

cards.name: Crypt Rats
cards.oracle_text: {X}: This creature deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.
cards.flavor_text:
"Shoo, you little worm tails—go away! My corpses aren't your dinner!"
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

cards.name: Chittering Rats
cards.oracle_text: When this creature enters, target opponent puts a card from their hand on top of their library.
cards.flavor_text: Bottom feeders sometimes rise to the top.

cards.name: Earsplitting Rats
cards.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, each player discards a card.
Discard a card: Regenerate this creature.
cards.flavor_text: Rats come in one amount: too many.

cards.name: Gobhobbler Rats
cards.oracle_text: Hellbent — As long as you have no cards in hand, this creature gets +1/+0 and has "{B}: Regenerate this creature." (The next time it would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)
cards.flavor_text: Lyzolda's pet rats eat better than the average citizen. In fact, they can usually be found eating the average citizen.

cards.name: Typhoid Rats
cards.oracle_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
cards.flavor_text: When Tasigur sent his ambassadors to the Abzan outpost, the true envoys were not the naga but the infectious rats they carried with them.

cards.name: Swarm of Rats
cards.oracle_text: Swarm of Rats's power is equal to the number of Rats you control.
cards.flavor_text:
"Rats, rats, rats! Hundreds, thousands, millions of them, and every one a life."
—Bram Stoker, *Dracula*

cards.name: Thriving Rats
cards.oracle_text:
When this creature enters, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever this creature attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
cards.flavor_text: In Ghirapur, even the lowliest residents live in lavish surroundings.

cards.name: Wave of Rats
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When this creature dies, if it dealt combat damage to a player this turn, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Blitz {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Wave of Rats
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When this creature dies, if it dealt combat damage to a player this turn, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Blitz {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Wave of Rats
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When this creature dies, if it dealt combat damage to a player this turn, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Blitz {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Wave of Rats
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
When this creature dies, if it dealt combat damage to a player this turn, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
Blitz {4}{B} (If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and "When this creature dies, draw a card." Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)

cards.name: Commander Greven il-Vec
cards.oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Commander Greven il-Vec enters, sacrifice a creature.
cards.flavor_text:
"Rage is the only freedom left me."
—Greven *il*-Vec

cards.name: Broodheart Engine
cards.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, surveil 1.
{2}{B}{G}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Return target creature or Vehicle card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: The only honor greater than piloting a Speedbrood vehicle is becoming one yourself.

cards.name: Cranial Ram
cards.flavor_text: To ensure proper fit, the mandibles can be inserted directly into the ears.

cards.name: Cutthroat Centurion
cards.oracle_text: Sacrifice another artifact or creature: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
cards.flavor_text: "We both serve the Demon Thane. Your parts would better serve with me."

decks.creator: SuperAdmin
decks.name: Red Dragon
decks.description: Mazo preparado para dejar un dolor carnal igualada a las llamas lanzadas por los dragones de este mago agresivo. Disfruta ver si cara de dolor >:D

cards.name: Demanding Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature of their choice.
cards.flavor_text: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

cards.name: Death by Dragons
cards.oracle_text: Each player other than target player creates a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: Suddenly, Eldo felt very alone.

cards.name: Sarkhan's Dragonfire
cards.oracle_text:
Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.flavor_text: "I am most myself when I am least human."

cards.name: Sarkhan, Dragon Ascendant
cards.oracle_text:
When Sarkhan enters, you may behold a Dragon. If you do, create a Treasure token. (To behold a Dragon, choose a Dragon you control or reveal a Dragon card from your hand.)
Whenever a Dragon you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on Sarkhan. Until end of turn, Sarkhan becomes a Dragon in addition to its other types and gains flying.

decks.creator: Papitas
decks.name: Flower
decks.description: Deck preparado con cartas de flores y plantas que dejaran a sus oponentes acabados, sus combos no permiran que hagan nada. Super recomendadoo!!!

cards.name: Carpet of Flowers
cards.oracle_text: At the beginning of each of your main phases, if you haven't added mana with this ability this turn, you may add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Islands target opponent controls.

cards.name: Bumbleflower's Sharepot
cards.oracle_text:
When this artifact enters, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.")
{5}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy target nonland permanent. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: "I may have overestimated the portions."

cards.name: Grim Flowering
cards.oracle_text: Draw a card for each creature card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text:
"Nothing in nature goes to waste, not even the rotting corpse of a good-for-nothing, blood-sucking vampire."
—Halana of Ulvenwald

cards.name: Lupinflower Village
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {W}. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
{1}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may reveal a Bat, Bird, Mouse, or Rabbit card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

cards.name: Shadowy Backstreet
cards.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {W} or {B}.)
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

cards.name: Blanchwood Treefolk
cards.flavor_text: The massive Argivian attack on their rooted kindred was a declaration of war to the treefolk.

cards.name: Ghoultree
cards.oracle_text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: It uproots entire fengrafs to add to its twisted frame.

cards.name: Heartwood Treefolk
cards.oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
cards.flavor_text:
"In all my years in Llanowar I never understood where trees fit in. They are revered by elves and watered on by dogs."
—Mirri of the *Weatherlight*

cards.name: Ironroot Treefolk
cards.flavor_text:
"'I'll show you how to handle the treefolk!' the giant bragged, and he strode off into the forest. Two days later he returned, his face masked in sap and a nest behind his ear. None dared ask who won."
—Azeworai, "The Treeling"

cards.name: Scarwood Treefolk
cards.oracle_text: This creature enters tapped.
cards.flavor_text: To treefolk's sense of time, ages pass as hours. They stood as witnesses to the apocalypse, the years of which they saw as one cacophonous, ultra-destructive moment.

cards.name: Kodama of the North Tree
cards.oracle_text:
Trample
Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
cards.flavor_text:
"The monks of the North Tree rarely saw their kodama until the Kami War, when it woke like a slumbering, angry bear."
—"Poem of the Five Trees"

cards.name: Treebeard, Gracious Host
cards.flavor_text: "I go my own way, but your way may go along with mine for a while."
